item.title: Software Development Lifecycle Phases
item.description: Process is Important Software like building a house or designing a car is hard. Much like the design and construction of a house or car, software development must be planned, organized and thought through to a great extent before the actual development or building can start. Once the construction or development starts a series of well defined steps must be adhered to in order to achieve the goal the project originally set out to accomplish.
